name: Adee Comprehensive Accessibility Tool
description:
Adee is a comprehensive and powerful accessibility testing tool. You can test color contrast and apply changes, simulate 8 color blind simulations and generate them, test touch target sized to make sure they meet the various device standards and share test results with your team! ... and more!


★ Features:

  • Alt Text Generator

✓ Generate Alt Text for Svg, Png, Jpg images

✓ Automatic image format detection.

✓ Add the following information to generate Alt Text:

◦ Whether the image is Informative / Decorative

◦ Image Title

◦ Image Description

◦ Code/Tag recommendations

✓ Bulk adds, remove, reorder and update

✓ Comment, generate and share with the team


  • Touch Target Size Standard checker

✓ Check your touch targets have correct size based on the following criteria:

✓ Apple touch devices

✓ Android touch devices

✓ Nielsen

✓ WCAG

★★★ And smart suggestion to meet the standards and requirements! to make sure your design is accessible on touch devices.


How it works:

-       Select touch target size tab (hand icon)

-       From the first dropdown menu > Select the device you want to test your touch target size in

-       From the second drop down menu > Select your touch target (such as a button, link, or any other type of hyperlinks)

-       Then a table shows the test results and recommended standard sizes for your design to make sure it's accessible on touch devices


Check Adee touch target detailed instructions!


  • Colorblind Simulator

✓ Simulate 8 different forms of

    color-blindness

✓ Modes and views comparison

✓ Colorblind Generator

✓ Black and White simulation

✓ Comment on your contrast test result

✓ Share the test results with your team


Check Adee Colorblind simulator detailed instructions!


  • Comprehensive Contrast Checker

✓ Based on WCAG guideline.

You can:

✓ Easily Adjust Your Color Contrast

✓ Swipe Layers and Colors

✓ Live preview

✓ Easily Undo to Original Color

✓ Apply changes to your design

✓ Access to your saved/global colors

✓ Comment on your contrast test result

✓ Share the test results with your team


Check Adee contrast checker detailed instructions!
